name: Rocky's adventure
description:
hi guys! 

I made a video game.

Its my first game using unity, I used scratch up until now, so I wanted to make something simple.

rocky's adventure is a really cute basic platformer, you control rocky, a little hand drawn rock, and try to make your way until the end to catch a flower.

I made all the art for the game using my mouse cursor, because I don't have a drawing tablet, it was made in about a week, and it contains 10 short levels. 

ho, and one last thing, you can jump only when the bottom-left side of the player touches the ground, mostly because I am not experienced enough to fix it...

overall the game was really fun to make,   and I learned a lot.

to play the game extract the zip file and double click on "rocky's adventure.exe" to open it up.

Thank you, and see you next time.
